SEARCH

Class Player

java.lang.Object
Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.json.simple.JSONStreamAware
public class Player extends Object implements org.json.simple.JSONStreamAware
Represents a player in the game.

Player encapsulates the player's information such as name, score, level, and game statistics. It implements JSONStreamAware to support JSON serialization.

Version:
1.4
Author:
Waleed Aamer
